reviews.title: My children love playing this piano..
reviews.comment: Its suit for any age..even I love it too..its fun and make my child happy..WE LOVE IT TQ
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupendous
reviews.comment: One of the best app on my andriod. Its actually realistic and must have for piano lovers. Sound is perfect. Thanks! Vipul
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing and Innovative
reviews.comment: Amazing app, recording a sample and play it over piano is very innovative.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More than just 2 octaves
reviews.comment: I love the sound & that u can change the sound of it in certain ways,both not only do i need that upper f key,but i also need an upper g key at least. It needs more than just the 2 octaves given, whether we can play it all on 1 screen or not. Would give 5 stars if there were more keys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How 2 load?
reviews.comment: Does any one know under what type of file the music or track ur trying to load have 2 be saved as for it to.show up when u load ur.music from ur sd.card?? I tryed loading and non of my music pops up plz help othet than that good app will give 5* when i.can do it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small ui suggestion
reviews.comment: I wonder if it would be possible to use tilt sensors or two-thumb gestures to get the app to slide an octave to the left or the right if you are using a device with a small screen? Otherwise this is keeping me entertained for a few minutes (I can\'t pay an instrument).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great sound, too few keys
reviews.comment: Too few keys to actually get any real music out of. The sound quality was fantastic its just too bad its just too small. What can i expect? Im using a tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, I really like the sample recorder but the phone vibrates when you go to record a sample, resulting in a hiss or click. If you could fix that, it would be very cool!
reviews.author: Danny Pearce

reviews.title: Good tool
reviews.comment: Luv it music at the finger tips don\'t know much bout music but app is full of enough basic options to push
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: its the best piano app in the market but i would be even better if you guys couod add an option to switch to even more octives :) just for people that have huge screens
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One of the best applicacion
reviews.comment: I love playing keyboard... This is the app I was waiting for.... Perfect features, perfect sound, perfect idea, comeon download now.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good fun
reviews.comment: I haven\'t tried the MIDI options yet, but this is good fun. I did notice a slight glitch when changing from playing with two octave display to a single octave, but restarting the app cured that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s okay
reviews.comment: Definitely not meant for a phone screen. Does not have a lot of keys either. There needs to be a scroll option so you can use multiple areas of a piano.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, supports multitouch on my phone. Would benefit from full midi functionality though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wow! Finally after many piano apps I actually found one that EXCEEDS my expectations by far! Simply an amazing app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing, But...
reviews.comment: Could you add a scrolling option? Because certain tunes can\'t be played if they need to go down a key. Great app; Once this is fixed, 5 stars. ~Lovino Vargas
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really fun
reviews.comment: I love the \'sampling\' feature, ads are unobtrusive and frequently relevant (which is nothing short of amazing). Single feature I\'d add is the ability to scale the keyboard, and scrolling to higher/lower octaves. Possibly damping and sustain but then that would really be far too good for a free app.
reviews.author: Night Lithium

reviews.title: AWEZOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s the best cuz u can record ur own sngs and u can also, pick wat stile u want and u can pick wat u want 2 play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great app but i just wish there were more keys and the keys were labled to the matching boys thanks other than that great app I liked that you could have different instrument noises :)
reviews.author: Kayleigh Rooney
